title: Define Data Model
description: Design and document the data model that will store code quality metrics, team performance statistics, and project health indicators.

title: Develop Code Quality Analysis Module
description: Write the code for analyzing the quality of the codebase, including metrics such as complexity, maintainability, and test coverage.

title: Create Team Performance Monitoring Module
description: Develop a module for monitoring team performance based on metrics such as productivity, code commits, and issue resolution.

title: Design Project Health Dashboard
description: Create a user-friendly dashboard for displaying actionable insights into project health, including code quality, team performance, and development progress.

title: Integrate with External APIs
description: Connect CodeLibra with external APIs such as version control systems, issue tracking tools, and continuous integration services.

title: Conduct Code Reviews
description: Review the code written for each module to ensure it adheres to coding standards and best practices.

title: Perform Security Audits
description: Evaluate the security of the codebase, identify potential vulnerabilities, and provide recommendations for remediation.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create user guides, API references, and other documentation to help developers and users make the most of CodeLibra. The documentation will include details about how to integrate with various data sources, use the project health dashboard, and apply actionable recommendations for improving code health, optimizing team workflows, and enhancing overall project management.

title: Define the overall architecture and design of CodeLibra
description: Outline the software structure, components, and interactions, taking into account the requirements for data integration, machine learning algorithms, and user interface.

title: Design the machine learning models for CodeLibra
description: Specify the algorithms and techniques to be used for code analysis, predicting bottlenecks, suggesting refactoring opportunities, and providing actionable recommendations based on specific development team needs.
dependencies: Define the overall architecture and design of CodeLibra

title: Create user interface designs for CodeLibra
description: Design an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that allows users to easily access insights, recommendations, and other relevant data about their software development processes.
dependencies: Define the overall architecture and design of CodeLibra

title: Develop the backend services for CodeLibra
description: Implement the necessary services to handle data integration from various sources, machine learning algorithms, and user interactions.
dependencies: Define the overall architecture and design of CodeLibra

title: Develop the database schema for CodeLibra
description: Design the database structure to store and manage all necessary data for analysis, recommendations, and other relevant information.
dependencies: Define the overall architecture and design of CodeLibra

title: Implement data integration with various sources
description: Connect to version control systems, issue trackers, and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring secure and efficient access to relevant data.
dependencies: Define the overall architecture and design of CodeLibra

title: Perform unit tests for each component of CodeLibra
description: Write test cases to verify that individual components are working as intended, ensuring that data integration, machine learning algorithms, and user interface interactions function properly.
dependencies: Develop the backend services for CodeLibra
Create user interface designs for CodeLibra

title: Conduct security assessments for CodeLibra
description: Perform comprehensive security evaluations to identify potential vulnerabilities and ensure that data protection, privacy, and confidentiality are maintained throughout the platform.
dependencies: Develop the backend services for CodeLibra

title: Write documentation for CodeLibra
description: Create comprehensive and easily accessible technical documentation to help users understand how to use and maintain the platform.
dependencies: Develop the backend services for CodeLibra
Create user interface designs for CodeLibra
